author: Aloysius Xavier Lopez
text:
Chennai Corporation has resumed work on the Link Road and stormwater drains along the southern part of the Marina beach. The current work covers the western part of the Link Road.

Work on the seaward side of the road was stopped following protests by activists in 2014. The Chennai Corporation is planning to widen the landward side of the Link Road before the notification of elections.

The stormwater drain on the landward side of the road is expected to be constructed shortly. Local fishermen and activists have been claiming that the works are in violation of CRZ rules.
title: Ongoing work covers western part of stretch
